ZEVO Intro

Your full local sports ecosystem, in one place.

ZEVO helps you discover where to play, who to play with, and when to lock your next session.

What ZEVO Provides

Discover Sports Arenas

Find nearby grounds and courts across every sport with fast filters.

Open Discover Sports Arenas

Live Arena Map

Open map mode, compare options by area, and get instant directions.

Open Live Arena Map

Player Profile

Set your interests and skill to unlock personalized recommendations.

Open Player Profile

Public Chat & Meetup

Post timings, discuss slots, and create meetup plans with venue + time.

Open Public Chat & Meetup

Community Group

Connect with active players and coordinate games with your local circle.

Open Community Group

Help Center

Get support for bookings, profile setup, and feature guidance.

Open Help Center

Sports On ZEVO

Every sport on ZEVO has its own community energy. Browse all available sports and jump into the one that matches your pace.
